nodes.name: Traceability
nodes.accomplished:
Approach for next PNE deployment presented to PNE steerco (new deployment approach - sprints / agile)

Wider traceability proposal in review; 9 stakeholder interviews completed
nodes.nextSteps:
Mobilization of PNE sprint team

Review of Accenture proposal for rapid Veritas rollout.
nodes.needsToChange:
Less time than expected from stakeholders to confirm key inputs for proposal - risk of delays and missed information

Rolling out Veritas at scale and pace will require very different program governance and business ownership than exists today. IT innovation and efficiency can help but not sufficient

nodes.name: MWC
nodes.accomplished: Canada and UK legal entity live.  Top to top meetings established with Romain / Will around how to shift to new model and provide more strategic level of support.
nodes.nextSteps: 'Fresh Eyes' assessment in March to review MWC risks & dependencies (Terms of Reference for review to be agreed with Romain & Will)
nodes.needsToChange: Accenture mgmt. attention on talent and risk items flagged; Recommend a specific deep dive into MWC post assessment

nodes.name: Digital Foundations Analytics
nodes.accomplished: 6 Agile sprints complete, data migrated, business and integration testing progressing well, dashboard performance improvements delivered. Key risk around performance and platform stability. BPD use case progressing to plan.
nodes.nextSteps: Conclude commercials for next phase of SRM analytics. Begin  local Market based self-service development and reports. Ramp up Germany users, full go-live in UK & DE in May
nodes.needsToChange: Continue to improve solution performance and SAP HANA platform and services

nodes.name: Compass
nodes.accomplished: Germany Live and Ireland going live; positive momentum in China (after some teething problems)
nodes.nextSteps: UK deployment next and France to follow. Accenture looking at new approach for Compass rollout (to optimize cost & speed)
nodes.needsToChange: Workshop on what it will take to successfully deploy TPM / Compass at pace across remaining markets

nodes.name: iPaaS
nodes.accomplished: C4E mobilized, on track with first phase activities

nodes.name: NA Petcare ATLAS
nodes.accomplished:
External 'Fresh Eyes' assessment completed. Accenture has made specific recommendations on what is required to:
  1. close hypercare for Waves 1-4
  2. drive engagement, manage risk and ensure adoption of solution for the upcoming go-live (Wave 5)
Recommendations were presented to Mark Johnson & team in Feb.
nodes.nextSteps: Accenture will provide additional support (via an SOW with fixed price / business outcomes) and will shortly be onboarding a team to support key activities in Wave 5 go-live
nodes.needsToChange: Recommend workshop to look at ways SAP projects are being delivered across the industry (and other industries) with modern methodologies (to drive efficiencies, business value and accelerated timelines)

nodes.name: Shift to Fixed - 12 weeks
nodes.accomplished: New Contracts have been utilizing shorter timeframes and Fixed Fee, where appropriate
nodes.nextSteps: Agree 'short form' contract; Align firm plan and timing to move work with business and commercial.
nodes.needsToChange: Execution of the plan to shift existing capacity portfolio into fixed price SOW's will require additional capacity both from the business and commercial teams.

nodes.name: Contract Simplification
nodes.accomplished: Shared mutual vision; Mars is working on simplified contract documents
nodes.nextSteps: Mars to socialize new contract prototypes and align with Accenture
nodes.needsToChange: Need to move faster to enable the teams to accelerate through shift.

nodes.name: VHG Medical Affairs Transformation
nodes.accomplished:
Completed initial clinical pathway design thinking workshop with 15 VHG clinicians

Completed 1 clinical site visit; 9 scheduled for w/c Mar 12 in PA, CT, and NY

Finalized Med Affairs platform definition with CMOs and aligned on chapters of repeatable playbook for pathway design
nodes.nextSteps:
Field site visits to gather data

Complete consumer quant survey of diabetes pet owners to understand willingness-to-pay, key challenges, and decisions on vet choice

Debrief key observation findings within business units

Close workshop to debrief and define target pathway options & prioritize improvements
nodes.needsToChange: Large amount of organization change management required to bring people along the journey.  Team watching multiple threads of transformation to assure alignment

nodes.name: Digital Identity
nodes.accomplished: Initial Discussion with Mars  about a workshop to explore/discuss about a possible IDM roadmap for Mars.
nodes.needsToChange: Work with Andrew to clarify priority vs. other items from 3/9 visit.

nodes.name: AP Transformation
nodes.accomplished: Joint agreement on transformation plan and roadmap
nodes.nextSteps: Execution of initiatives and automations; Get contract agreement in place to extend NA scope
nodes.needsToChange: Alignment between business and commercial on most pragmatic way forward with extension agreement; support for some process standardization will be required; IT support for tools required for automation plans

nodes.name: VHG Pet Data Platform
nodes.accomplished:
Defined business rules to map the Banfield data set into the key clinical diagnostic pathway actions

Aligned and defined business rules on 7 dimensions for standard patient cohort analysis



Completed initial single-dimension cohort analysis by diagnostic test and aligned on multi-dimensional analysis for w/c Mar 12

Defined business rules to identify common comorbid conditions with diabetes as well as treatment business rules
nodes.nextSteps:
Patient cohort definition and groupings analysis to find common groupings of patients and tests

Pathway treatment analysis to identify common groupings of diagnostic tests and downstream differential outcomes

Definition of common outcome measurement set for diabetes pathway to define 'good' and establish a baseline measurement

Definition of a repeatable process to consistently drive analysis of a given pathway (beyond diabetes)
nodes.needsToChange: Effective pathway analysis will require data modelling amongst Bluepearl, Banfield, and Petpartners data set; current data use agreements are not in place, limiting analysis to just Banfield (primary care population)

nodes.name: eContent
nodes.accomplished:
Product: delivered for Pet Care US hybrids PCMl, however change in approach for strategic platform. Embraced Salsify for Pet Care US and most likely for the other roll-outs as well

Brand: Delivered OpenText DAM (OTMM) successfully for Confectionery, Skittles and 5 live with a Test and Learn since December. Assisting Mars with (OTMM) OpenText platform issues through Accenture alliance.
nodes.nextSteps: Assess new BPM platform to improve the workflows delivery; Continue to deliver DAM capability
nodes.needsToChange:
Product: Accenture team advises that Mars complete a full gap analysis on Salsify prior to a 'test and learn' roll out to avoid further cost and delays down the road.

Brand: Given the movement of Marketing to shift to smaller, more agile workflows, there is a risk of a lack of integrate back into the foundational Digital Assessment Management capability - the team should have an approach that allows the speed and flexibility of the local solutions that still requires the core integrations to provide the full picture of capability.
